snippet: The Philadelphia Flyers signed the veteran center Vincent Lecavalier to a five-year contract after he was cut from the Tampa Bay Lightning roster last week.
abstract: Philadelphia Flyers sign veteran center Vincent Lecavalier to a five-year contract.
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia Flyers signed the veteran center Vincent Lecavalier to a five-year contract after he was cut from the Tampa Bay Lightning roster last week.

headline.main: Flyers Give Lecavalier a Five-Year Deal
headline.print_headline: Flyers Give Lecavalier a Five-Year Deal
